title: EUNE is just as bad as yesterday
body: nothing has improved, i thought a multi-million dollar company could actually fix their game or at least revert the patch but no

replies.body: Indeed, it looks like there are still issues ongoing after maintenance.  Our network team continues to work on it, though.  Keep an eye out on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page as updates come.
